segments.text: What is included in a job advertisement ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Generally speaking , there are the company , the job title , job description , requirement , and so on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are the accesses of the job ads ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are many sources , such as newspaper , Internet and direct visit .
segments.speaker: S2
